text:
Pahlawan wanita itu menggendong putranya yang berusia satu bulan dengan senyuman di wajahnya: "Tidak ada gunanya bahkan jika ibu mertuanya membuat keributan. Sudah takdir [redacted_name] tidak bernasib sama dengan putranya, jadi dia tidak bisa memaksakannya." "
Setelah [redacted_name] tiba di pulau itu, para pembuat onar di kompleks terus mengawasi keluarga [redacted_name], ingin melihat kapan ibu mertua keluarga [redacted_name] dan menantu perempuan akan berkelahi. Akibatnya, aroma yang tercium dari keluarga [redacted_name] setiap hari membuat seluruh kompleks menelan ludah mereka.
Makanan kurungan yang dibuat [redacted_name] untuk [redacted_name] begitu kaya sehingga wanita tua di halaman sangat terkejut hingga dia menampar kakinya: "Ya Tuhan, saya belum pernah melihat menantu perempuan yang bisa begitu nyaman selama kurungan!"
trans:
The heroine held her one-month-old son with a smile on her face: "It would be pointless even if her mother-in-law caused a scene. It is already fate that [redacted_name] does not share the same destiny as her son, so she cannot force it." "
After [redacted_name] arrived on the island, the troublemakers in the compound kept a close eyes on the [redacted_name] family, eager to witness the moment when the [redacted_name] ’s mother-in-law and daughter-in-law would clash. Consequently, the aroma wafting from the [redacted_name] family each day made the entire complex swallow their saliva.
The confinement food that [redacted_name] prepared for [redacted_name] was so sumptuous that the elderly woman in the courtyard was taken aback that she slapped her leg in disbelief: "Oh my God, I’ve never seen a daughter-in-law so at ease during confinement! "
